title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4209.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4209.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth and codify
administration by the New York State Urban Development Corporation of the

Regional Revolving Loan Trust Fund authorized by the Omnibus Economic

Development Act of 1987, chapter 839 of the Laws of 1987. The purpose of the
trust fund is to authorize regional corporations, selected by the corporation, to administer trust fund proceeds to assist eligible businesses in the
implementation of projects that demonstrate a substantial likelihood of
providing increases in net new permanent jobs or retaining jobs in businesses
that need such financial assistance to remain viable. The program will also
seek to establish affirmative action goals for participation in projects by
minorities and women. Notes

4209.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
